oml:parameter.oml:name: F
oml:parameter.oml:description: Full class name of filter to use, followed by filter options. eg: "weka.filters.unsupervised.attribute.Remove -V -R 1,2"

oml:parameter.oml:name: W
oml:parameter.oml:description: Full name of base classifier. (default: weka.classifiers.trees.J48)

oml:parameter.oml:name: output-debug-info
oml:parameter.oml:description: If set, classifier is run in debug mode and may output additional info to the console

oml:parameter.oml:name: -do-not-check-capabilities
oml:parameter.oml:description: If set, classifier capabilities are not checked before classifier is built (use with caution).

oml:parameter.oml:name: num-decimal-places
oml:parameter.oml:description: The number of decimal places for the output of numbers in the model (default 2).

oml:parameter.oml:name: U
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use unpruned tree.

oml:parameter.oml:name: O
oml:parameter.oml:description: Do not collapse tree.

oml:parameter.oml:name: C
oml:parameter.oml:description: Set confidence threshold for pruning. (default 0.25)

oml:parameter.oml:name: M
oml:parameter.oml:description: Set minimum number of instances per leaf. (default 2)

oml:parameter.oml:name: R
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use reduced error pruning.

oml:parameter.oml:name: N
oml:parameter.oml:description: Set number of folds for reduced error pruning. One fold is used as pruning set. (default 3)

oml:parameter.oml:name: B
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use binary splits only.

oml:parameter.oml:name: S
oml:parameter.oml:description: Do not perform subtree raising.

oml:parameter.oml:name: L
oml:parameter.oml:description: Do not clean up after the tree has been built.

oml:parameter.oml:name: A
oml:parameter.oml:description: Laplace smoothing for predicted probabilities.

oml:parameter.oml:name: J
oml:parameter.oml:description: Do not use MDL correction for info gain on numeric attributes.

oml:parameter.oml:name: Q
oml:parameter.oml:description: Seed for random data shuffling (default 1).

oml:parameter.oml:name: -doNotMakeSplitPointActualValue
oml:parameter.oml:description: Do not make split point actual value.

oml:parameter.oml:name: V
oml:parameter.oml:description: Invert matching sense of column indexes.

oml:parameter.oml:name: D
oml:parameter.oml:description: Output binary attributes for discretized attributes.

oml:parameter.oml:name: Y
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use bin numbers rather than ranges for discretized attributes.

oml:parameter.oml:name: E
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use better encoding of split point for MDL.

oml:parameter.oml:name: K
oml:parameter.oml:description: Use Kononenko's MDL criterion.

oml:parameter.oml:name: precision
oml:parameter.oml:description: Precision for bin boundary labels. (default = 6 decimal places).

oml:flow.oml:name: weka.RandomForest
oml:flow.oml:description: Leo Breiman (2001). Random Forests. Machine Learning. 45(1):5-32.

oml:parameter.oml:name: I
oml:parameter.oml:description: Number of trees to build. (default 100)

oml:parameter.oml:name: K
oml:parameter.oml:description: Number of features to consider (<1=int(log_2(#predictors)+1)). (default 0)

oml:parameter.oml:name: S
oml:parameter.oml:description: Seed for random number generator. (default 1)

oml:parameter.oml:name: depth
oml:parameter.oml:description: The maximum depth of the trees, 0 for unlimited. (default 0)

oml:parameter.oml:name: O
oml:parameter.oml:description: Don't calculate the out of bag error.

oml:parameter.oml:name: print
oml:parameter.oml:description: Print the individual trees in the output

oml:parameter.oml:name: num-slots
oml:parameter.oml:description: Number of execution slots. (default 1 - i.e. no parallelism)

oml:parameter.oml:name: B
oml:parameter.oml:description: Break ties randomly when several attributes look equally good.

oml:parameter.oml:name: output-debug-info
oml:parameter.oml:description: If set, classifier is run in debug mode and may output additional info to the console

oml:parameter.oml:name: -do-not-check-capabilities
oml:parameter.oml:description: If set, classifier capabilities are not checked before classifier is built (use with caution).

oml:parameter.oml:name: num-decimal-places
oml:parameter.oml:description: The number of decimal places for the output of numbers in the model (default 2).
